installCommand: npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ && npm config delete //registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken || true && npm config delete //npm.pkg.github.com/:_authToken || true && npm config set always-auth false && echo '--- npm config (short) ---' && npm config get registry && echo '--- npm ping ---' && npm ping --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ || true && npm install --no-audit --no-fund --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
